course.subject: CORE
course.name: Traditional Chinese Poetry: Early Chinese Poetry
course.description: The course will describe the origins and early development of classical Chinese poetry, e.g, Shijing, Chuci, folk songs, and major poets of the Han Dynasties. The meaning of these poetry will be examined. The distinguishing aesthetic feature will be discussed.
course.prerequisites: a passing letter grade in CORE 1401 OR CORE 1402 OR CORE 1403 OR CORE 1404 OR LANG 1002 (prior to 2022-23)
